reviewText:
It is so wonderful to be able to see and know the evolution of our Great Parks.  Your collection is perfect.
I also appreciate that you selected an Indian to present some of the information as the Indians so well
respected the earth and all it's creatures...including all it's flora and fauna.

There are no words to describe how wonderfully amazing this series is. If you are an American (or not) you need to watch this wether you can take a trip to one of these places or not. I felt sheer joy, sadness, inspiration and Love for all things natural while enjoying this series. I could watch it over and over again and not get tired of it.
  The only problem I encountered was that I never received the music soundtrack CD that was suppose to be part of the package. Sincerely, Bill
LOVED WATCHING ABOUT THE NATIONAL PARKS AND THE BACKGROUND ABOUT THEM I DIDN'T KNOW ABOUT. VERY INTERESTING HOW EACH PARK WAS FOUNDED AND DEVELOPED.

I bought this for my wife for Christmas and she cried tears of joy.  She "loves watching Dayton Duncan cry", as she says.  She'd rank this in the top 5 of my best gifts to her... including her engagement ring.

fantastic video collection;  great story telling format with historical information and highlighting the importance of the national parks;  yes, you can watch it on PBS, but this way you can watch in the car during the road trip to the Grand Canyon!
